sentence: He rolled back women's rights, vowing to make abortion a crime with 10 years in prison, the narrator says in the ad, adding: Just when we need to move forward, Brian Kemp keeps taking us back.
author: Kalyn Womack
title: Abortions and Gun Laws Center Stacey Abrams Campaign Ad

sentence: See the ad from One Georgia below: “📺WATCH📺 Brian Kemp keeps taking us back… on guns, on abortion, and even a massive tax giveaway… for himself. Georgians deserve a governor who will move us forward – not a guy stuck🕹in🦕the📼past.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Pro-Stacey Abrams group comes out swinging against Brian Kemp in first campaign ad

sentence: Former President Donald Trump's refusal to move on from the 2020 presidential election might backfire for the Republican Party in Georgia, where incumbent GOP Governor Brian Kemp is facing a challenge from Democratic gubernatorial nominee Stacey Abrams.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Trump's Ongoing War With Brian Kemp Could Boost Stacey Abrams in Georgia

author: Jessica Chasmar
title: Stacey Abrams on board of foundation awarding millions to woke professors pushing prison abolition, CRT
Abrams makes more endorsements in Georgia Democratic runoffs
